description: The role of probability theory. Image by John Tsitsiklis. Used with permission.

image_metadata.caption: The role of probability theory is to provide a framework for analyzing phenomena with uncertain outcomes. (Image by John Tsitsiklis.)
image_metadata.credit: Image by John Tsitsiklis. Used with permission.
image_metadata.image-alt: Graphic showing the connections between probability theory, inference and statistics, and the real world.
